refers: ILLNESS / SICKNESS / DISEASE / MALADY / AILMENT / SYMPTOM

stems.BSC: (to be) a state of physical or mental illness/sickness/malady; to be physically or mentally ill/sick, to suffer an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady
stems.CSV: (to be) the state of physically suffering from a disease/illness/ailment/malady; to suffer therefrom
stems.OBJ: (to be) a living being infected/suffering from an infectious illness/disease; entity/party that is sick

stems.BSC: (to be) a state of manifesting/displaying a symptom of an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady; to show/manifest/display a symptom of an illness/ailment/sickness/malady
stems.CSV: (to be) the physical act of manifesting a symptom; for a symptom to physically occur
stems.OBJ: (to be) a living being suffering/manifesting/displaying a symptom of an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady

stems.BSC: (to be) a state of physical or mental incapacity or impairment or weakness or decrepitude due to an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady
stems.CTE: (to be) the particular impairment(s) one suffers or experiences due to an illness/ailment/sickness/malady
stems.CSV: (to be) a state of having to deal/struggle with or adapt to a physical or mental impairment due to an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady
stems.OBJ: (to be) a living being experiencing/suffering from a physical or mental incapacity or impairment or weakness or decrepitude due to an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady

notes: This root and its derivations can be combined with the ADI affix.

stems.BSC: (to be) a state of living with a static/permanent physical or mental disability (i.e., not disease-related, e.g., missing a limb, paralysis due to a war injury, blindness due to an accident, etc.)
stems.CTE: (to be) a state of physical disability (i.e., not having all of one’s potential abilities)
stems.CSV: (to be) a state of suffering/enduring/dealing with the effect(s) of a disability

stems: (to be) a state of living with a temporary physical or mental disability (i.e., not disease-related, e.g., a broken leg, blindness while recovering from eye surgery, etc.)
(to be) a state of using/living with a prosthetic or adaptive device or process or routine to compensate for a physical disability

refers: disease/malady caused by exposure to adverse environmental element(s)
disease/malady caused by exposure to toxic chemical substance/poison
disease/malady caused by adverse personal habits (e.g., smoking, diet, sloth, etc.)
malady caused by complications from an injury or injuries
iatrogenic or nosocomial disorder/malady caused by medical/medicinal/surgical treatment or hospitalization
disease/malady/disorder of unknown etiology, unrecognizable/unclassifiable disease/malady/disorder
shortness of breath / asthma / sleep apnea

stems: listlessness, inability to come to full alertness

refers: bone fracture / concussion / locked retinal detachment
CAUSE OF AN ILLNESS / SICKNESS / DISEASE / MALADY / AILMENT

stems.BSC: (to be) the pathogenic or toxicological cause of an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady (e.g., microbial, toxic substance, venom)
stems.CTE: (to be) a state of infection/exposure to a pathogen/poison/venom
stems.CSV: (to be) an act of contracting or being exposed to a pathogen/poison/venom
stems.OBJ: (to be) the microbe, poison, venom, toxic substance involved

stems: (to be) the idiopathic/congenital cause of an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady (e.g., the cause(s) of cancer, autoimmune disorder, mental illness, Type-1 diabetes)

(to be) the iatrogenic or lifestyle/behavioral/environmental cause of an illness/disease/ailment/sickness/malady (e.g., smoking, gluttony, heatstroke, hypoxia due to living at high altitude, alcoholism, drug addiction, botched surgery, bodily injury)
